articles.title: 'Cricket's carbon footprint brings opportunity'
articles.description: Australia captain Pat Cummins discusses his foundation, and the sport's opportunity to lead the way on tackling climate change.
articles.content:
Cummins wins BBC Green Sport Athlete of the Year

articles.title: Beaumont & Brook named PCA players of the year
articles.description: England batters Tammy Beaumont and Harry Brook are named the Professional Cricketers' Association women's and men's players of the year.
articles.content:

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
